attributes.action: Offer ILR to international health care workers in NHS.
attributes.additional_details: International health care workers are one of the key factors in NHS workforce. They risk their own life to combat COVID and save UK and its citizens. Some international health care workers are still working under VISA. We thank UK government for free VISA extensions. However offering ILR at this point is the best way to respect those who made a tremendous sacrifice to save UK.
attributes.background: International health care workers play a major role in NHS and risk their lives to combat COVID pandemic. Some of them have unfortunately died. France has now offered permeant residency to international health workers.
